radiographic_examinations.findings: Distended gallbladder containing stones with pericholecystic fluid. Mild gallbladder wall thickening is present. There is a 1.1 cm simple cyst in the right lobe of liver. The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation.
